artist: Engraver: William Byrne; Artist: After Thomas Hearne; Draftsman: Francesco Bartolozzi; Printer: Samuel Middiman
description: Lumley Castle above a river with two couples on shore in left foreground; one couple in boat on river
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date and Inscription

In plate below image in black: [Drawn by T. Hearne  Figures by Bartolozzi Engraved by W. Byrne & S. Middleton/ LUNLEY CASTLE/ London Publish\'d as y\'e act directs Jan\'y 1st 1779 by T. Hearne & W. Byrne]; in pencil below image: [1-202]
portfolio: From Illustration to "The Antiquities of Great Britain" 1786
title: Lunley Castle
